com.github.errantlinguist.latticevisualiser
Interface Settings

All Known Implementing Classes:
ArgParser, EdgeFontTransformer, EdgeStrokeTransformer, LatticeVisualiser, StateAspectTransformer, StateFontTransformer, StatePaintTransformer, StateShapeTransformer, StateType
public interface Settings

Constant settings to be used during visualisation of a word/phone lattice.

Since:
2011-11-12
Version:
2011-11-12
Author:
Todd Shore

Field Summary
static Color BACKGROUND_COLOUR
          The main window background colour.
static ImmutableMap<StateType,Color> COLOURS
          A map of StateTypes to Colors for deriving the colour used to draw the vertex representing a state.
static int DEFAULT_MIN_STATE_SIZE
          The default minimum size of a state/vertex, to avoid them being too small to see on-screen.
static double DEFAULT_STATE_SIZE_MULTIPLIER
          The default state/vertex size multiplier to use to scale their size based on the number of incoming/outgoing edges they have.
static Dimension DEFAULT_WINDOW_DIMENSION
          The default main window dimensions.
static EdgeLabelTransformer EDGE_LABEL_TRANSFORMER
          The EdgeLabelTransformer to be used in visualisation.
static String FINAL_LABEL
          The final label, e.g. "</s>".
static Font GOAL_VERTEX_FONT
          The Font to use for labelling goal states, i.e.  states which have edges outputting a word symbol.
static Font INTERMEDIATE_VERTEX_FONT
          The Font to use for labelling intermediate states, i.e.  states which do not have edges outputting a word symbol.
static Font NON_WORD_LABEL_FONT
          The Font to use for visualising edges which output a non-word label.
static int POLYGON_SIDE_COUNT
          The number of sides a non-star Polygon is be drawn with.
static int STAR_POINT_COUNT
          The number of sides a star-shaped Polygon is be drawn with.
static float STATE_ASPECT
          The aspect ratio of the Ellipse2D vertex representing a state in visualisation.
static StateAspectTransformer STATE_ASPECT_TRANSFORMER
          The StateAspectTransformer used for deriving the aspect ratio of a vertex drawn to represent a lattice state.
static Renderer.VertexLabel.Position STATE_LABEL_POSITION
          The position of a state/vertex label in relation to the state/vertex itself.
static ToStringLabeller<Integer> STATE_LABEL_TRANSFORMER
          The ToStringLabeller to be used in visualisation for labelling states/vertices.
static float[] STROKE_DASH
          The stroke type to use for drawing dashed edge arcs.
static float WEIGHT_FACTOR
          The factor to multiply Edge.weight by to calculate the stroke weight to use when drawing the edge.
static Font WORD_LABEL_FONT
          The Font to use for visualising edges which output a word label.

The main window background colour.

COLOURS

static final ImmutableMap<StateType,Color> COLOURS
A map of StateTypes to Colors for deriving the colour used to draw the vertex representing a state.

DEFAULT_MIN_STATE_SIZE

static final int DEFAULT_MIN_STATE_SIZE
The default minimum size of a state/vertex, to avoid them being too small to see on-screen.
